mapper.insert: INSERT INTO borrow_records (main_user_id, copy_id, borrow_date, due_date, renewal_count, is_overdue, fine_amount) VALUES (#{mainUserId}, #{copyId}, #{borrowDate}, #{dueDate}, 0, false, 0.0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM borrow_records WHERE copy_id = #{copyId} AND return_date IS NULL
SELECT * FROM borrow_records WHERE main_user_id = #{mainUserId} ORDER BY borrow_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE borrow_records SET return_date = #{returnDate}, is_overdue = #{isOverdue, typeHandler=DAO.BooleanIntegerTypeHandler}, fine_amount = #{fineAmount} WHERE record_id = #{recordId}
UPDATE borrow_records SET due_date = #{newDueDate}, renewal_count = renewal_count + 1 WHERE record_id = #{recordId}
